entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -40.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
